title: Processes - Integration by Completing the Square

content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction with numerator 12 times x squared, and denominator 2 x, plus 1, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>12</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="2 times x cubed, times the natural log of, the absolute value of, 2 x, plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="4 times x cubed, times the natural log of, the absolute value of, 2 x, plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 times x squared, minus 3 x, plus three halves times the natural log of, the absolute value of, 2 x, plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 times x squared, minus 3 x, plus 3 times the natural log of, the absolute value of, 2 x, plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3 times x squared, minus 3 x, plus three halves times the natural log of, the absolute value of, 2 x, plus 1, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.10: Integrating Functions Using Long Division and Completing the Square

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
